attributes.action: Debate if by-election should take place for 11 mps who resigned.
attributes.additional_details: 11 mps resigned from party's people have a right for a by election to have their say on they seats
attributes.background: As we come up to Brexit 11 mps resigned from their party's 8 from labour and 3 from Tories the people voted for candidates party they have now went independent surely the people have the right to say if they still want them as mps for there area.
